sentences.english: Gang village to investigate Liu Shijiang Dong Ping mountain, just to give him a weeks time.
sentences.chinese: 冈村让董平山去调查陆世强，还只给他一周的时间。

sentences.english: The Fuping Group in Pingshan County, Hebei Province, is a suite of high-grade amphibolite-facies rocks.
sentences.chinese: 河北省平山县阜平群是一套高角门岩相岩石。

sentences.english: Passenger cars and KATO DL of Taipingshan logging railway, 1968.
sentences.chinese: 太平山森林铁道的客车与加藤制柴油机车。

sentences.english: Let Ma Jingkui Dong Ping mountain and Duan Yucai help killing Liu Shijiang query.
sentences.chinese: 董平山让马景奎和段玉才帮忙查询杀害陆世强之人。

sentences.english: Pai-Ling Rope way, Taipingshan Logging Railway System, 1968.
sentences.chinese: 太平山森林铁道系统中的白岭索道著点。
